model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
You job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Speaker B, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes" or "No"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Speaker A: I loaded up on repellent like you said and I also grabbed a few of those mosquito repellent bracelets, I figured why not!
Speaker B: Have you been hiking lately?
Speaker A: Yes I did actually. I lead some friends on a hike in a local trail last weekend. They got tired really quickly as they never go hiking they told me.
Speaker B: Sounds like me. I am not a fan of the outdoors. Did your friends manage to have a good time anyway?
Speaker A: Oh they did. We had some nice snacks along the way. Oddly enough, we had some trail mix that someone had made at home. It was quite tasty. We also had some juice and water packed to make sure everyone stayed hydrated. You should join us one day! I'll make it as fun as possible.
Speaker B: I will someday. just not in the summer when all the bugs are out! Where do you go hiking the most?
Speaker A: I like to go hiking in the local trails here. I am familiar with them and there's so many routes that I can take. Sadly, the bugs are as bad here as they are anywhere else.....

MEMORY:
Speaker A is a personal trainer who loves camping in remote areas. This causes Speaker B to recently go on a long hike and enjoy it. Speaker A's Appalachian Trail hike will last for 10 days.
Speaker B enjoys taking cruises and is not as into the outdoors as Speaker A. Speaker A enjoys camping and hiking as free activities. Speaker B gets scared by bugs and creepy crawlies in the outdoors. Speaker B shared tips on repelling mosquitos using sprays with 20% DEET and other active ingredients.
Speaker A enjoys going on camping trips and hiking trails in parks. Speaker A enjoys camping and hiking as free activities. Speaker B gets scared by bugs and creepy crawlies in the outdoors. Speaker B shared tips on repelling mosquitos using sprays with 20% DEET and other active ingredients.

Brief explanation: The MEMORY contains helpful past information as it outlines Speaker B's fear of bugs and creepy crawlies which aligns with their current stance mentioned in DIALOGUE CONTEXT about disliking summer hikes due to bugs. The MEMORY also states that Speaker B shared tips on repelling mosquitos which might tie into the initial conversation about mosquito repellent.
Judgement: "Yes"
